title: Quit With The Outdates Takes
description:
Linda and Emily sit down with longtime Anaheim Ducks captain Ryan Getzlaf to talk about his recently announced retirement. They also get into some controversial comments, which teams they have their eyes on as we approach the playoffs, and ESPN's Brian Boucher joins us for our 5 minutes to talk "sleeper breakout stars of the playoffs".
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
